tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Wonderful experience with Shivesh Nurshing Home. *Dr. Saloni Chopra* was a wonderful Gynaechologist.
Mr Wife Got the Cute Baby Through Normal Delivery 
Thanks to Dr Saloni Ma’am. 
And the staff was always helpful and Very Kind specially Thanks To Nurse Arti, Nisha, Onam, Manisha, 
And Reception Staff also very Wonderfull they always Support me ( Mr Raj , Arvind and Tanya)
And at the last Day cleaning Department( Sunita Aunty and All) also provide Excellent service .

A Big Hug and Thanks to Team Of Dr Saloni Mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Thanks to Dr. Saloni chopra for making my pregnancy journey easy and comfortable. She listens and explains each and every query very patiently. She never prescribed uncessary tests and medicines. Overall its a great experience 

Thank you ma'am for always being there to help us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
All facilities provided by Shivesh Nursing Home was pretty much good and Excellent I recommend  this Nursing home for every couple 

My wife and my new born baby's health was good after my wife's Delivery as Dr. Saloni ma'am behavior is too friendly 
the way she's treating her patients  the staff is too cooperative overall Shivesh  Nurshing Home is too Higenic.


I recommend SHIVESH NURSHING HOME once should vist to Dr Saloni Ma'am,  .
Did my ultrasound in 5 weeks pregnancy while there was no need of that. Just for earning more, they did this test instead of doing HCG test which would have been enough at that time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: This was my first gynaecologist experience and it was bad . Doctor didn’t wear mask, she wasn’t even wearing gloves . First of all , the fees is 500 on practo and if you directly go to the clinic it’s 300. I was already so nervous, she didn’t even inform me before inserting the device inside me . And that device is definitely huge. I think she should have informed me. After that she assumed that i was sexually active I don’t know what she saw in there but i said no i am not sexually active . I was but i am not anymore it’s been 4-5 months . I don’t know if this how you treat a patient . I think you can’t straight away insert something without informing the patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Where Doctors are considered for their empathy and ethics...I came across Doctor and hospital who is not only rude but do not have respect and compassion for the patient. I took my relative for stitches removal (which they put)... from the very first visit there was no Doctor to entertain the patient, everything was done by the ward boy and on discussing the issue with the doctor...the only reply we got was that the staff was well equipped..... Everytime I paid the fee for the ward boy to check my relative without any doctor visit or consultation....When the matter was discussed with the authority, they mentioned that they trust their ward boys(despite there are only 2 ward boys and a nurse even if there is an emergency ....patient can wait but they will first ask to make receipt and money) and nurses....and was extremely rude .** ******* *** **** **** ***** *** ****** ***** ********************* ****** **** **** ** **** ********* ** **** ****** **** ******** **** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I have good experience in visiting the clinic, doctor was friendly and understanding. I will recommend others also.

review: I recommend Dr.Saloni.She explain me about my problem very friendly & clearly and her prescribed medicines are working very well.Only issue is about waiting time because I went for my appointment at 07:50 but Dr.meet at 09:10.But its ok because if my problem cure better,this is not a big issue.Thanks Dr. Saloni.
